title: Camila Cabello says she's 'so happy' with boyfriend Shawn Mendes and he 'feels like home'
text:
They went public with their romance earlier this year, after releasing their song Señorita.

And on Monday morning, Camila Cabello, 22, opened up about her relationship with boyfriend Shawn Mendes, 21, gushing that she's 'so happy' and that he 'feels like home.'

Speaking on Lorraine, the Havana songstress also admitted that she 'didn't have time to fall in love' before the age of 20 as she confirmed that some of the songs on her upcoming album, Romance, are about her pop star boyfriend.

Happy lady: On Monday morning, Camila Cabello, 22, opened up about her relationship with boyfriend Shawn Mendes, 21, gushing that she's 'so happy' and that he 'feels like home'

As talk turned to Shawn, she gushed: 'I’m so happy. I’ve known him for such a long time and I don’t know, he just feels like home to me. Yeah, I’m really happy.

And asked if songs on her upcoming album are about him, she admitted: 'Towards the end there were, yeah, yeah.'

Explaining why she took some time off, she said: 'I needed it. I needed to just be a human for a little while.

'Honestly, I wouldn’t say time off because I was writing my album during that time and that comes with it’s own rollercoaster of emotions.

Loved-up: Speaking on Lorraine, the Havana songstress confirmed that some of the songs on her upcoming album, Romance, are about her pop star boyfriend

Real talk: Camila also admitted that she 'didn't have time to fall in love' before the age of 20 because she was 'working all the time'

'But, I definitely feel like I got the chance to be a normal person. Like, from my first album to now, it's probably what's influenced my entire album.

'And it being called Romance and it being about falling in love, I literally did not have time to fall in love before the age of 20, because I was just working all the time.'

'Everything from my first album was drawn from my imagination. I was single for like 20 years.'

Kind: Speaking about the songs on her album, she said: 'I know people will know things are about them. Sometimes I won't put that line in because it will hurt the other person's emotions'

Going into further detail about her upcoming album, she said: 'Every song is its own story. It was inspired by, I was in my first serious relationship at the beginning of this album. That's what inspired 'Romance' and it being about falling in love.

'All of the stories are just my life and what’s happened the last two years.

'It's hard because I know people will know things are about them. Sometimes I won't put that line in because it will hurt the other person's emotions.'

Camilla was reported dating British dating guru Matthew Hussey in early 2018 but were said to have broken up earlier this year after over a year together.

Here they are! Camila and Shawn went public with their romance earlier this year, after releasing their song Señorita

Camila's appearance on Lorraine comes just days after she appeared on Capital Breakfast with Roman Kemp.

The singer gushed over the romance with Shawn saying: 'Yeah. Yeah, we’re pretty happy, I really, really love him a lot.'

When asked how it was working with Shawn, she said: 'Well it was so fun! You know, we’ve been friends for a really long time and we were kinda like we just didn’t…

'There was a period where we didn’t hang out as much just because we were both busy and this song was really fun because we got to just hang out again like we did on the song we did before - I Know What You Did Last Summer...

'Which was when we got really close. This was just like we were like ‘oh yay, we get to be pals and just hang out!’
